goal.ch:
"本課程乃學術華語入門課程，學生選修完本課程應能提升：
1. 生活基本溝通能力
2. 學科主題內容之聽解與表述能力"

outline.ch: 本課程以學習者為中心並著重互動。學生透過口頭報告、團隊合作、日誌寫作、影片觀賞及測等活動複習，應用和自我評量所學。 學習內容包括一般及特定話題之詞語、句式及言談之用法。
outline.en: "In this class, learner-centered and interactive activities will dominate class periods. Oral presentations, group work, online learning and regular tests are required to help students apply, review, strengthen and self-evaluate what they have learned in class. Students will be responsible for their own learning progress and they will enjoy the achievement."
